description: Partial approval of details pursuant to condition 4 (Roof Top Structures) relating to Phase 1 only (211 Old Street, and studio buildings) of planning permission reference P2013/1667 dated 13 December 2013 for  extensions and alterations and associated re-cladding to 207-211 Old Street,(including additions at roof level) refurbishment and change of use of Empire House to provide A3/A5 restaurant use at basement and ground with office (B1)/Hotel (C1)/ private members club(Sui Generis) above, creation of part 2, part 3 storey buildings to provide additional B1 and A1,A2, A3, A4, floorspace, and creation of new pedestrian link from Old Street to Baldwin Street with associated landscaping and associated works.
decision_conditions: The details within this approval relate only to Phase 1 of the development.  A seperate application relating to Empire House was approved by P2014/0085/AOD on 11th April 2014.  Details relating to Phase 2 (207 Old St) therefore remain outstanding.
